name: 王明展
objective: This course introduces the concepts, theories, and approaches of facilities planning. Topics discuss in class such as material handling, systematic layout planning, discrete layout problem, continuous layout problem, equal area layout problem, unequal area layout problem, heuristic method, storage system layout, and site selection are also included.
schedule:
1. Introduction to Facilities Planning
2. Systematic Layout Planning
3. The Layout Problem-Qualitative
4. The Layout Problem-Quantitative
5. Equal-Area Layout Problem
6. Unequal-Area Layout Problem
7. Computerized Layout Planning
8. Optimization
9. Storage System Layout
10. Other Topics (Location, Cellular Manufacturing and Layout)
scorePolicy:
Attendance 10%,
Homework 15%,
Mid exam. 25%,
Final exam. 25%
Final Project report 25%
materials:
1. Facilities Planning, Intermational Edition, Tompkins, White,
Bozer, Tanchoco, John Wiley & Sons, Inc., 2003, 華泰文化代理。
2. Facility Layout and Location: An Analytical Approach, Francis,
McGinnis, White, Prentice Hall, 華泰文化代理。
Office Hours:
Wed. 10:10-12:00
